## Introduction
This notebook creates the grid-level estimates for analyses.

## Dependencies
This notebook requires...

```{r load-packages}
# tidystl packages
library(gateway)
library(compstatr)

# tidyverse packages
library(dplyr)
library(readr)

# spatial packages
library(sf)

# other packages
library(here)
```

## Download Grid Data

```{r download-grids}
grids <- gw_get_repo(repo = "STL_BOUNDARY_Grids", file = "Grids")
```

## Arson Per Grid Square

```{r}
arson_point <- read_csv(here("data", "clean", "arson.csv"))
```

```{r}
arson_point <- cs_missing_xy(arson_point, varx = XCoord, vary = YCoord, newVar = missingXY)
```
